snippet: Europe, Africa and the United States have spent months discussing what to do about an Islamist takeover of northern Mali. The situation has just gotten more complex.
abstract: Europe, Africa and the United States have spent months discussing what to do about an Islamist takeover of northern Mali. The situation has just gotten more complex.

headline.main: Prime Minister's Ousting Complicates Strategy to Curb Mali's Islamists
